SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
public class UserControllerTest extends Object
Advanced Integration tests for the UserController class.

This test suite utilizes Java Reflection to bypass JavaFX UI restrictions and interact directly with the controller's private fields and methods. It ensures comprehensive code coverage for borrowing logic, return policies, fine calculations, and payment processing.

Version:
2.3
Author:
Zainab

  • Method Details

    • initToolkit

      @BeforeAll static void initToolkit()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit. This is required to instantiate JavaFX controls (Label, TableView) in a headless testing environment.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each execution. Initializes the controller, mocks UI components, and prepares default user data.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails to inject fields.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown() throws IOException
      Cleans up resources after each test. Deletes the temporary database file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file deletion fails.

    • injectField

      private void injectField(String name, Object value) throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testRowFactory_ColoringLogic

      @Test void testRowFactory_ColoringLogic() throws Exception

      Exception - if reflection fails.

      Exception - if reflection fails.
